member.name: M:SimpleMvvmToolkit.ViewModelBase`1.RegisterToReceiveMessages(System.String,System.EventHandler{SimpleMvvmToolkit.NotificationEventArgs})
member.summary: Register callback using a string token, which is usually defined as a constant.
member.para: There is no need to unregister because receivers are allowed to be garbage collected.

member.name: M:SimpleMvvmToolkit.ViewModelBase`1.RegisterToReceiveMessages``1(System.String,System.EventHandler{SimpleMvvmToolkit.NotificationEventArgs{``0}})
member.summary: Register callback using string token and notification with TOutgoing data.
member.para: There is no need to unregister because receivers are allowed to be garbage collected.
member.typeparam: Type used by notifier to send data

member.name: M:SimpleMvvmToolkit.ViewModelBase`1.RegisterToReceiveMessages``2(System.String,System.EventHandler{SimpleMvvmToolkit.NotificationEventArgs{``0,``1}})
member.summary: Register callback using string token and notification with TOutgoing data and the subscriber's callback with TIncoming data.
member.para: There is no need to unregister because receivers are allowed to be garbage collected.
member.typeparam: Type used by notifier to send data
Type sent by subscriber to send data back to notifier

member.name: M:SimpleMvvmToolkit.ViewModelBase`1.UnregisterToReceiveMessages(System.String,System.EventHandler{SimpleMvvmToolkit.NotificationEventArgs})
member.summary: Unregister callback using a string token, which is usually defined as a constant.
member.para: This is optional because registered receivers are allowed to be garbage collected.
